price: 12. Voor hen hebben het volk van Noah; en ‘Ad en Farao – de bezitter van de palen-.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wafir'ʿawnu dhū al-awtādi
